list_page_teaser: It can be challenging building a personality profile based on only a few hours' worth of entertainment, but some characters are iconic and demand to be explored.  Visit this gallery to see if it contains images of any of your favorite characters!
description_html:
This gallery is for fans of Classic Movies such as Citizen Kane and Taxi Driver.

For more images of iconic characters from classic movies, see the Star Wars Prequel and Film Noir Galleries on this site.
story_html:
I plan to post more images of unforgettable characters from other movies soon.

To keep up to date, follow this site on social media or join the SeeOurMinds.com email list!

image_list.title: Charles Foster Kane
image_list.subtitle_html: Everyone's Favorite Newspaper Tycoon
image_list.gallery_page_teaser: The X in this image shows that X is ....  Click on the image to learn more!
image_list.explain_dom: The Blue Green Red Yellow in this spiritual portrait represents X's dominant trait, openness rationality emotion pragmatism.  In Extraverts, the dominant function is directed outwardly, and spiritual portraits use a long vertical line to represent this, because it is the side of their personality that is most evident.
image_list.explain_aux: The Blue Green Red Yellow in this spiritual portrait represents X's auxiliary trait, openness rationality emotion pragmatism.  In Extraverts, the auxiliary function is directed inwardly, and spiritual portraits use a horizontal line to represent this, because it is less evident than the dominant function.

image_list.title: Travis Bickle
image_list.subtitle_html: Everyone's Favorite Taxi Driver
image_list.gallery_page_teaser: The X in this image shows that X is ....  Click on the image to learn more!
image_list.explain_dom: The Blue Green Red Yellow in this spiritual portrait represents X's dominant trait, openness rationality emotion pragmatism.  In Introverts, the dominant function is directed inwardly, and spiritual portraits use a long horizontal line to represent this.
image_list.explain_aux: The Blue Green Red Yellow in this spiritual portrait represents X's auxiliary trait, openness rationality emotion pragmatism.  In Introverts, the auxiliary function is directed outwardly, and spiritual portraits use a vertical line to represent this, because it is more evident than the dominant function.
